imdb.plot outline: The Story of two young and highly successful brothers running a Million Dollar Company on the elite and upscale side of Atlanta,Georgia. Although the Bridgefields are known for their style, class, money and power, there are a few people in their inner circle secretly plotting to take everything they have. With secrets, lies, and scandals silently going against this family, just who will be bold enough to go against the Bridgefields with an effort to take them down?
imdb.title: Bridgefield
plot: The Story of two young and highly successful brothers running a Million Dollar Company on the elite and upscale side of Atlanta,Georgia. Although the _Bridgefield_ (qv)s are known for their style, class, money and power, there are a few people in their inner circle secretly plotting to take everything they have. With secrets, lies, and scandals silently going against this family, just who will be bold enough to go against the _Bridgefield_ (qv)s with an effort to take them down?::W. ArQuez Burch
